resources.string: Mathamuse

1. Type in the calculated answer and press Enter button to proceed for the next question. 
 2. If you choose to skip ahead, just press Enter button.
 3. Amplify your score by answering a large streak of correct answers.

 4. You can triple your points by playing this category.

1. Evaluate the question and just press True or False button to proceed for the next question. 
 2. If you choose to skip ahead, just press either True or False button.
 3. More than 30% incorrect answers will reset your earned score and stars to 0!
 4. Amplify your score by answering a large streak of correct answers.
